name: Change Post Label
author: fccoelho7

sections.description:
If you don’t use WordPress like blog, it able you to rename the Post’s label, dispensing the necessity of create a new custom post type or hide the Post menu item.

Usage

  1. Download and extract change-post-label.zip to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Configurations > Change Post Label

Contribute

Use https://github.com/fccoelho7/Change-Post-Label
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract change-post-label.zip to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Configurations > Change Post Label
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release
  • At the first time, it renames the label “Posts” to “Not√≠cias”, that is “News” in Portuguese.

1.5

  • Now is possible to choose any description to “Posts” label.
